sn55.24:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato hoti.
sn55.24:1.5: Tatra sudaṃ sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti:
sn55.24:1.7: Ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati.
sn55.24:1.8: Yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato;
sn55.24:2.1: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.24:2.5: Tatra sudaṃ, bhante, sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti—
sn55.24:2.6: acchariyaṃ vata, bho, abbhutaṃ vata, bho.
sn55.24:2.7: Ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati.
sn55.24:2.8: Yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato;
sn55.24:3.1: “Yo so, mahānāma, dīgharattaṃ upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, so kathaṃ vinipātaṃ gaccheyya.
sn55.24:3.2: Yañhi taṃ, mahānāma, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn55.24:3.3: ‘dīgharattaṃ upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato’ti, saraṇāni sakkaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
sn55.24:3.4: Saraṇāni, mahānāma, sakko dīgharattaṃ upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato.
sn55.24:4.1: Idha, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.24:4.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.24:4.6: So āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
sn55.24:4.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.24:5.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.24:5.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.24:5.5: hāsapañño javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.24:5.6: So pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
sn55.24:5.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.24:6.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.24:6.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.24:6.5: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.24:6.6: So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti, sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
sn55.24:6.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.24:7.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.24:7.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti;
sn55.24:7.5: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.24:7.6: So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇoti.
sn55.24:7.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.24:8.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti …
sn55.24:8.4: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.24:8.7: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya mattaso nijjhānaṃ khamanti.
sn55.24:8.8: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo agantā nirayaṃ agantā tiracchānayoniṃ agantā pettivisayaṃ agantā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ.
sn55.24:9.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti …
sn55.24:9.4: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato,
sn55.24:9.8: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo agantā nirayaṃ agantā tiracchānayoniṃ agantā pettivisayaṃ agantā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ.
sn55.24:9.9: Ime cepi, mahānāma, mahāsālā subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyuṃ, ime cāhaṃ mahāsāle byākareyyaṃ: ‘sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā’ti;
sn55.24:9.11: Saraṇāni, mahānāma, sakko maraṇakāle sikkhaṃ samādiyī”ti.
